org.keyboardplaying.mapper.engine

Class BaseEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.keyboardplaying.mapper.engine.BaseEngine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MappingEngine, UnmappingEngine

    public abstract class BaseEngine
extends Object
    An abstract base for engine. This class includes methods for fetching SimpleParser instances when mapping or unmapping.
    Author:
    Cyrille Chopelet (http://keyboardplaying.org)

      • getParser

        protected <T> SimpleParser<T> getParser(Field field)
                             throws MappingException,
                                    ParserInitializationException
        Returns the appropriate SimpleParser based on the supplied field's type.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to convert a value from or to
        Returns:
        the SimpleParser to use
        Throws:
        MappingException - if no SimpleParser can be found or annotation settings are missing (e.g. Temporal on temporal fields)
        ParserInitializationException - if the SimpleParser cannot be found or initialized
